content: the camellia blanket is a beautiful beginner friendly baby blanket it has a wonderful texture and looks great in any color this pattern comes with 2 trim options making it gender neutral pattern difficulty easy size 30 x 36 yarn 1025 yards dk #3 weight yarn more camellia patterns camellia sweater camellia hat camellia cowl all of my patterns are thoroughly tested or tech edited by experienced pattern testers and fellow designers to ensure you get a pattern that is easy to read and follow all of my patterns are in american terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
